The port entered is not a number!
Please enter an email address to sign in with!
Please enter a password to sign in with!
The email entered is not a valid email address.
The password is too short. Make sure it is %1$d characters long!
This password is too easy to guess. Enter a harder one.
Connecting…
Connecting to weServer with IP: %1$s on Port: %2$d
Cancel
Okay
Connection Timed Out

Could not connect to the weServer. Make sure it is turned on and you entered the right IP address! \n\nIf you set a custom port, insert a colon after the IP Address followed by the port (ip:port). If not, don\'t worry about this step.
Connection Error
An error occurred while connecting to the weServer.
Could not establish a connection to the weServer. Make sure it is running!
Connection cancelled.
A server-side error caused the connection to be lost.
An error occurred while authenticating the login information. \n\nPlease restart your app or weServer instance.
An unknown error occurred and has caused the connection to be dropped.
This device appears to be already connected to this weServer. \n\nIf it is not, try restarting your weServer to fix this message.
The username or password entered is not correct. Please try again.
The weServer has shut down and closed the connection.
This device has been forcefully disconnected by the weServer.
You have disconnected from the weServer.
weMessage could not connect because the server is running on a different version.
The connection to the weServer has unexpectedly been closed.
The connection to the weServer has been lost.

An error occurred while trying to process a result returned from a message.

Permissions Error
weMessage does not have permission to access media storage.\n\nPlease grant it permission in order to be able to send attachments.
weMessage does not have permission to write to your storage.\n\nPlease grant it permission in order save attachments.
weMessage does not have permission to access the camera. \n\nPlease grant it permission in order to use the Camera.
weMessage does not have permission to record audio. \n\nPlease grant it permission in order to send voice messages.

An error occurred during camera capture.

The attachments are too large to be sent. \n\nPlease reduce your file sizes.
You have exceeded the maximum chat icon size (%1$s). \n\nPlease choose a smaller photo.
Not Delivered
An error occurred while delivering this message.
This message could not be delivered because the number is not valid.
This message could not be delivered because it is not registered with iMessage.
This message could not be delivered because the group chat was not found.
This message could not be delivered because the service is not available.
This message could not be delivered because assistive access is disabled.

Unable to add participant because the group chat was not found.
Cannot add participant because assistive access is disabled for the weServer.
Cannot add participant due to a Messages Application error.
You cannot remove people in a chat with only 2 members.
An error occurred while removing a person from the chat.
Unable to remove a participant because the email or phone number was not found.

Cannot remove participant due to a Messages Application error.
You cannot leave a chat with only 2 members.

You cannot send messages in Offline Mode! \n\nConnect to your weServer in order to text.
You cannot rename group chats while in Offline Mode! \n\nConnect to your weServer in order to do this.
You cannot leave a group chat while in Offline Mode! \n\nConnect to your weServer in order to do this.
You cannot remove people in group chats while in Offline Mode! \n\nConnect to your weServer in order to do this.
